prompts.1: What are you most grateful for today?
prompts.2: Who made you smile today and why?
prompts.3: What's one thing you learned today?
prompts.4: Describe a moment that brought you peace today.
prompts.5: Who inspired you today and how?
prompts.6: What challenge did you overcome today?
prompts.8: What's something kind you did for someone today?
prompts.9: What's one thing you want to remember about today?
prompts.10: How did you practice self-care today?
prompts.12: What's a small win you had today?
prompts.13: Who do you appreciate in your life and why?
prompts.15: What's something that challenged your perspective today?
prompts.16: Describe a beautiful moment you witnessed today.
prompts.17: What are you looking forward to tomorrow?
prompts.18: How did you show up for yourself today?
prompts.19: What would you tell your morning self about how today went?
prompts.20: What's one thing you're proud of today?
prompts.21: How did you connect with others today?
prompts.23: What's a goal you moved closer to today?
prompts.24: Describe a sensory experience you enjoyed today.
prompts.25: What wisdom did today teach you?
prompts.26: How did you express creativity today?
prompts.27: What boundary did you honor today?
prompts.28: What filled your heart with joy today?
prompts.29: What would make tomorrow even better?
prompts.30: How has this month changed you?
prompts.31: What legacy are you building with your daily choices?

special.01-01: It's a new year! What intentions are you setting for the year ahead?
special.01-26: Republic Day! What does freedom mean to you?
special.02-14: Valentine's Day! Who do you love and appreciate most?
special.03-04: Happy Holi! How are you adding color to your life today?
special.03-08: International Women's Day! Which woman has influenced your life?
special.08-15: Independence Day! What are you grateful for about your country?
special.08-28: Happy Raksha Bandhan! How are you celebrating the bond of protection and love?
special.10-02: Gandhi Jayanti! How can you practice non-violence and peace?
special.10-10: Happy Birthday Mudit! Wishing him joy and success. How are you celebrating him today?
special.10-20: Happy Dussehra! What inner evil or bad habit are you conquering today?
special.11-04: Happy Birthday Sera! The world is blessed to have you. What is your wish for yourself this year?
special.11-08: Happy Diwali! How are you lighting up your life and the lives of others?
special.11-14: Children's Day! What brings out your inner child?
special.12-25: Christmas! What gift has life given you this year?
special.12-31: Last day of the year! What was your biggest lesson this year?
